name: Oneesama
tagline: Experimental Android client for Dynasty Reader
body:
### Download APK
[Oneesama 0.1.0 (Beta 1)](https://github.com/DefiantCatgirl/Oneesama/releases/download/v0.1.0-beta.1/Oneesama.apk)

![Oneesama QR](http://i.imgur.com/hnzVtGb.png)

### Downloading chapters
To read chapters in the app open Dynasty Reader in your mobile browser - when you select a chapter on the site the app will intercept the intent and download the chapter.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
